content.rendered: Great info here, I have been struggling with the switch from flow triggers to process builder, and was so happy this came out when it did. Process builder, although designed to look easy, I have found working with it a pain, especially the additional clicks and delayed interface. The only trick I learned so far was don’t use Firefox use Chrome.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Join Us For Automation Hour, a New Webinar Series!
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: If you are a Salesforce Admin, Developer, Analyst, Architect, or anyone else that does automation of anything in Salesforce, the new Salesforce Automation Hour is for you!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Move Related Lists On Lead Convert
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: It's not magic, it's Process Builder! Learn how you can move records related to Leads over to the Contact on Lead conversion, with a simple process.

img.alt_text: Move Related Lists On Lead Convert

jetpack-related-posts.title: Join Me for Automation Hour w/ Meighan Brodkey 12/16/16
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Salesforce Automation Hour is a Webinar series to demonstrate all levels of declarative Automation inside Salesforce. Webinar Name: Salesforce Automation Hour -12/16/2016 Time: 12pm PST (3pm EST) Presenter: Meighan Brodkey Webinar Registration Link: https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/8207021249714603267 Find the webinar resources here. Make sure you join us on the Success Community!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Create a Campaign Related Lists on Accounts
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Sometimes, you just want to see all the Campaigns for an Account, based on the Contacts associated and their Campaigns. Well, you can, and here is how I setup the Process after the question was posted on the Salesforce Success Community site. Part 1 Create an "Account" field on the…

img.alt_text: Action criteria for the Campaign member Account Process

jetpack-related-posts.title: Community Sharing Part 2: Guest Page Visibility
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: This post we expore guest user visibily in Experience Cloud. Every Community has a Guest User and Guest User Profile. A guest is someone that can see your community before they login - an Unauthenticated user. Each time a community or portal is created, Salesforce auto-creates a guest user profile…

img.alt_text: Community Sharing part 2_ Guest Page Visibility

jetpack-related-posts.title: Login Flow Deployment
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Update for Login Flow Deployments with Spring 21 and their new availability in the metadata API making them deployable!
